modName: Elven Longsword Retexture for Lost Longswords
summary: Small Weapon Retexture for an Elven Longsword.
descriptionHtml:
[size=18pt]Elven Longsword Retexture for Lost Longswords[/size]

Small Weapon Retexture for Mr.Brownstone\'s Lost Longswords Specifically the Elven longsword to match aMidianBorn\'s Darker Elven Armor.

[img]http://i1139.photobucket.com/albums/n555/mconie2010/MainPicture_zpsa1e1ab82.jpg[/img]

I decided to make this mod as aMidianborn only retextured the armor and it didnt match up so well to the weapons that remained. This is to my taste so i hope you like it, although it is not to the best quality as it is my first retexture and i will improve it as my skill increases.

You can find the Lost Longswords mod here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26261]Lost Longswords[/url]
Remember to endorse as it is a great lore-friendly mod

[u]Important Note[/u]: This does not contain the original mod which is required for this mod/retexture to work.
author: Mconi3
